description: Describes one or more of your paths.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: The filters. The following are the possible values: destination - The ID of the resource. filter-at-source.source-address - The source IPv4 address at the source. filter-at-source.source-port-range - The source port range at the source. filter-at-source.destination-address - The destination IPv4 address at the source. filter-at-source.destination-port-range - The destination port range at the source. filter-at-destination.source-address - The source IPv4 address at the destination. filter-at-destination.source-port-range - The source port range at the destination. filter-at-destination.destination-address - The destination IPv4 address at the destination. filter-at-destination.destination-port-range - The destination port range at the destination. protocol - The protocol. source - The ID of the resource. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_items.name: NetworkInsightsPaths
nested_items.description: Information about the paths.

nested_items.name: NetworkInsightsPathId
nested_items.description: The ID of the path.

nested_items.name: NetworkInsightsPathArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the path.

nested_items.name: CreatedDate
nested_items.description: The time stamp when the path was created.

nested_items.name: Source
nested_items.description: The ID of the source.

nested_items.name: Destination
nested_items.description: The ID of the destination.

nested_items.name: SourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the source.

nested_items.name: DestinationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the destination.

nested_items.name: SourceIp
nested_items.description: The IP address of the source.

nested_items.name: DestinationIp
nested_items.description: The IP address of the destination.

nested_items.name: Protocol
nested_items.description: The protocol.

nested_items.name: DestinationPort
nested_items.description: The destination port.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags associated with the path.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: FilterAtSource
nested_items.description: Scopes the analysis to network paths that match specific filters at the source.

nested_items.name: SourceAddress
nested_items.description: The source IPv4 address.

nested_items.name: SourcePortRange
nested_items.description: The source port range.

nested_items.name: FromPort
nested_items.description: The first port in the range.

nested_items.name: ToPort
nested_items.description: The last port in the range.

nested_items.description: The destination IPv4 address.

nested_items.description: The destination port range.

nested_items.name: FromPort
nested_items.description: The first port in the range.

nested_items.name: ToPort
nested_items.description: The last port in the range.

nested_items.description: Scopes the analysis to network paths that match specific filters at the destination.

nested_items.name: SourceAddress
nested_items.description: The source IPv4 address.

nested_items.name: SourcePortRange
nested_items.description: The source port range.

nested_items.name: FromPort

nested_items.description: The destination port range.

nested_items.name: FromPort
nested_items.description: The first port in the range.

nested_items.name: ToPort
nested_items.description: The last port in the range.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
